code: import React from"react";import $ from"jquery";import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var topMenu=function topMenu(){var switchMenuHandler=function switchMenuHandler(){$('.top-menu').toggleClass('active inactive');$('body').toggleClass('active');};$('body').on('click',function(e){if(!$('.top-menu').has(e.target).length>0){$('.top-menu').removeClass('active').addClass('inactive');$('body').removeClass('active');}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-menu inactive",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-menu__icon",onClick:switchMenuHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-menu__icon-1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-menu__icon-2"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-menu__bcg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"top-menu__list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{exact:true,to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/",activeClassName:"is-active",className:"menu-font link-2 link",children:"home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/shop/all",activeClassName:"is-active",className:"menu-font link-2 link",children:"shop"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/about",activeClassName:"is-active",className:"menu-font link-2 link",children:"about us"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/terms",activeClassName:"is-active",className:"menu-font link-2 link ",children:"terms & shipment"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/contact",activeClassName:"is-active",className:"menu-font link-2 link",children:"contact us"})})]})]});};export default topMenu;
